kunyomiExamples.meaning: to burn, to roast, to broil, to grill, to bake, to toast, to barbecue, to heat, to heat up, to make (charcoal, pottery, bricks, etc.), to bake, to fire, to burn, to tan (i.e. suntan), to burn, to print (a photo), to burn (an optical disc), to be jealous of, to be envious of, to envy
cooking, esp. frying or stir-frying, heating, tempering, -ware
yakiniku, Japanese dish of grilled meat similar to Korean barbecue, roasted meat, grill
rolled egg, rolled omelette (omelet), fried egg, frying pan for making rolled eggs
grilling (fish) with salt, broiling with salt, boiling seawater to get salt
to burn, to be roasted, to be heated, to be sunburnt, to fade (in the sun), to glow red (i.e. of the sky at sunset), to be jealous, to be envious
